00060 #ifdef WIN32
00061     const char fs = 92;
00062     #define F_OK 0
00063     #define W_OK 2
00064     #define R_OK 4
00065     #include <io.h>
00066     #define EGS_ACCESS ::_access

00074 static char __egs_app_msg1[] = "EGS_Application::EGS_Application(int,char**):";
00075 static char __egs_app_msg2[] = "EGS_Application::initSimulation():";
00076 static char __egs_app_msg3[] = "EGS_Application::runSimulation():";
00077 
00078 static EGS_LOCAL bool __egs_find_pegsfile(const vector<string> &paths,
00079         const string &pegs_file, string &abs_pegs_file) {
00080     string pfile = pegs_file;
00081     if (pfile.find(".pegs4dat") == string::npos) {
00082         pfile += ".pegs4dat";
00083     }
00084     for (unsigned int j=0; j<paths.size(); j++) {
00085         string this_pegs =!paths[j].empty() ? egsJoinPath(paths[j],pfile) : pfile;
00086         if (!EGS_ACCESS(this_pegs.c_str(),R_OK)) {
00087             abs_pegs_file = this_pegs;
00088             return true;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     return false;
00092 }

00105 
00106 int EGS_Application::userScoring(int iarg) {
00107     if (a_objects) {
00108         int early_return = 0;
00109         for (int j=0; j<a_objects[iarg].size(); ++j) {
00110             int res = a_objects[iarg][j]->processEvent((AusgabCall)iarg);
00111             if (res < 0) {
00112                 return res;
00113             }
00114             if (res > 0) {
00115                 early_return = res;
00116             }
00117         }
00118         if (early_return > 0) {
00119             return early_return;
00120         }
00121     }
00122     return ausgab(iarg);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void EGS_Application::checkEnvironmentVar(int &argc, char **argv,
00126         const char *n1, const char *n2, const char *env, string &var) {
00127     char *aux = getenv(env);
00128     if (aux) {
00129         var = aux;
00130     }
00131     else {
00132         var = "";
00133     }
00134     getArgument(argc,argv,n1,n2,var);
00135     if (!var.size()) egsFatal("%s\n  the environment variable %s is not set"
00136                                   " and it was not passed as argument\n",__egs_app_msg1,env);
00137     int n = var.size()-1;
00138     if (var[n] != '/' && var[n] != fs) {
00139         var += fs;
00140     }
00141 }

00143 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_GeometryHistory {
00144 public:
00145     struct Step {
00146         EGS_Vector x, u;
00147         EGS_Float  twant, t;
00148         int        ireg, inew;
00149         Step() {};
00150         Step(int Ireg, int Inew, const EGS_Vector &X, const EGS_Vector &U,
00151              EGS_Float Twant, EGS_Float T) : x(X), u(U), twant(Twant), t(T),
00152             ireg(Ireg), inew(Inew) {};
00153         void show() const {
00154             egsWarning("old region=%d, position=(%g,%g,%g), "
00155                        "direction=(%g,%g,%g) intended step=%g, new region=%d, "
00156                        "step=%g\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,twant,inew,t);
00157         };
00158     };
00159 
00160     EGS_GeometryHistory(int N=2) : steps(new Step [N]), nsize(N), ns(0),
00161         wrap(false) {};
00162     ~EGS_GeometryHistory() {
00163         delete [] steps;
00164     };
00165     void  addStep(int ireg, int inew, const EGS_Vector &x,
00166                   const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float twant, EGS_Float t) {
00167         steps[ns++] = Step(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00168         if (ns >= nsize) {
00169             ns = 0;
00170             wrap = true;
00171         }
00172     };
00173     void reportHistory() const {
00174         int nhave = wrap ? nsize : ns;
00175         egsWarning("\n************** Last %d geometry steps:\n",nhave);
00176         if (wrap) {
00177             for (int j=ns; j<nsize; j++) {
00178                 steps[j].show();
00179             }
00180         }
00181         for (int j=0; j<ns; j++) {
00182             steps[j].show();
00183         }
00184     };
00185 
00186     Step  *steps;
00187     int   nsize;
00188     int   ns;
00189     bool  wrap;
00190 };
00191 
00192 void EGS_Application::reportGeometryError() {
00193     ghistory->reportHistory();
00194 
00195     // check if we are over the tolerated limit for geometry errors
00196     run->geomErrorCount++;
00197     if (run->geomErrorCount > run->geomErrorMax) {
00198         egsFatal("\n\n******** Encountered %d geometry errors (maximum allowed is %d). \n \
00199         You can change this limit with the 'geometry error limit' run control input key. \n \
00200         Quitting now.\n", run->geomErrorCount, run->geomErrorMax);
00201     }
00202 }
00203 
00204 void EGS_Application::storeGeometryStep(int ireg, int inew,
00205                                         const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float twant, EGS_Float t) {
00206     ghistory->addStep(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00207 }

00209 EGS_Application::EGS_Application(int argc, char **argv) : input(0), geometry(0),
00210     source(0), rndm(0), run(0), last_case(0), current_case(0),
00211     data_out(0), data_in(0), simple_run(false), a_objects(0),
00212     ghistory(new EGS_GeometryHistory) {
00213 
00214     app_index = n_apps++;
00215 
00216     if (!active_egs_application) {
00217         active_egs_application = this;
00218     }
00219     {
00220         for (int call=BeforeTransport; call<AfterTransport; call++) {
00221             ausgab_flag[call] = true;
00222         }
00223     }
00224     {
00225         for (int call=AfterTransport; call<UnknownCall; call++) {
00226             ausgab_flag[call] = false;
00227         }
00228     }
00229 
00230     //
00231     // *** get the name of this application
00232     //
00233     if (!getArgument(argc,argv,"-a","--application",app_name)) {
00234         app_name = egsStripPath(argv[0]);
00235     }
00236     if (!app_name.size()) egsFatal("%s\n   failed to determine application "
00237                                        "name from %s or command line arguments\n",__egs_app_msg1,argv[0]);
00238     //
00239     // *** make sure EGS_HOME is set.
00240     //
00241     checkEnvironmentVar(argc,argv,"-e","--egs-home","EGS_HOME",egs_home);
00242     app_dir = egsJoinPath(egs_home,app_name);
00243     //
00244     // *** make sure HEN_HOUSE is set.
00245     //
00246     checkEnvironmentVar(argc,argv,"-H","--hen-house","HEN_HOUSE",hen_house);
00247     //
00248     // *** check if there is an input file specified on the command line
00249     //
00250     getArgument(argc,argv,"-i","--input",input_file);
00251     //egsFatal("%s\n  no input file specified\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00252     //
00253     // *** create the name of the working directory
00254     //
00255     char buf[512];
00256     sprintf(buf,"egsrun_%d_",egsGetPid());
00257     run_dir = buf;
00258     if (input_file.size() > 0) {
00259         run_dir += input_file;
00260         run_dir += '_';
00261     }
00262     else {
00263         run_dir += "_noinput_";
00264     }
00265     run_dir += egsHostName();
00266 
00267     //
00268     // *** check if there is a PEGS file specified on the command line
00269     //
00270     is_pegsless= false;
00271     if (!getArgument(argc,argv,"-p","--pegs-file",pegs_file)) {
00272         is_pegsless= true;
00273     }
00274     //gsFatal("%s\n  no PEGS file specified\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00275 
00276     //
00277     // *** check if the pegs file exists.
00278     //
00279     if (pegs_file.size() > 0) {
00280         string pdirs = egsJoinPath("pegs4","data");
00281         vector<string> pegs_paths;
00282         pegs_paths.push_back("");
00283         pegs_paths.push_back(egsJoinPath(egs_home,pdirs));
00284         pegs_paths.push_back(egsJoinPath(hen_house,pdirs));
00285         if (!__egs_find_pegsfile(pegs_paths,pegs_file,abs_pegs_file))
00286             egsFatal("%s\n  the pegs file %s does not exist or is not "
00287                      "readable\n",__egs_app_msg1,pegs_file.c_str());
00288     }
00289 
00290     //
00291     // *** check if the input file exists.
00292     //
00293     string ifile;
00294     if (input_file.size() > 0) {
00295         ifile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,input_file);
00296         if (ifile.find(".egsinp") == string::npos) {
00297             ifile += ".egsinp";
00298         }
00299         if (EGS_ACCESS(ifile.c_str(),R_OK))
00300             egsFatal("%s\n  the input file %s does not exist or is not "
00301                      "readable\n",__egs_app_msg1,ifile.c_str());
00302     }
00303 
00304     //
00305     // *** set the output file
00306     //
00307     if (!getArgument(argc,argv,"-o","--output",output_file)) {
00308         output_file = input_file;
00309     }
00310     if (!output_file.size()) {
00311         output_file = "test";
00312     }
00313     //
00314     // *** see if a batch run.
00315     //
00316     batch_run = false;
00317     for (int j=1; j<argc; j++) {
00318         string tmp = argv[j];
00319         if (tmp == "-b" || tmp == "--batch") {
00320             batch_run = true;
00321             //for(int i=j; i<argc-1; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+1];
00322             //argc--;
00323             break;
00324         }
00325     }
00326     //
00327     // *** see if parallel run.
00328     //
00329     string npar, ipar;
00330     n_parallel = i_parallel = 0;
00331     bool have_np = getArgument(argc,argv,"-P","--parallel",npar);
00332     bool have_ip = getArgument(argc,argv,"-j","--job",ipar);
00333     if (have_np && have_ip) {
00334         n_parallel = ::strtol(npar.c_str(),0,10);
00335         i_parallel = ::strtol(ipar.c_str(),0,10);
00336         if (n_parallel < 0) {
00337             egsWarning("%s\n  invalid -P argument %d\n",__egs_app_msg1,
00338                        n_parallel);
00339             n_parallel = 0;
00340         }
00341         if (i_parallel < 0) {
00342             egsWarning("%s\n  invalid -j argument %d\n",__egs_app_msg1,
00343                        i_parallel);
00344             i_parallel = 0;
00345             n_parallel = 0;
00346         }
00347         if (i_parallel > n_parallel) {
00348             egsWarning("%s\n  job number (%d) can not be larger than number"
00349                        " of parallel jobs(%d). Turning off parallel option\n",
00350                        __egs_app_msg1,i_parallel,n_parallel);
00351             n_parallel = 0;
00352             i_parallel = 0;
00353         }
00354     }
00355     else if (have_np || have_ip)
00356         egsWarning("%s\n  to specify a parallel run you need both,"
00357                    " the -P and -j command line options\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00358 
00359     //
00360     // *** see if user wants simple job control
00361     //
00362     {
00363         for (int j=1; j<argc; j++) {
00364             string tmp = argv[j];
00365             if (tmp == "-s" || tmp == "--simple-run") {
00366                 simple_run = true;
00367                 //for(int i=j; i<argc-1; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+1];
00368                 //argc--;
00369                 break;
00370             }
00371         }
00372     }
00373 
00374     final_output_file = output_file;
00375     if (i_parallel > 0 && n_parallel > 0) {
00376         batch_run = true;
00377         char buf[1024];
00378         sprintf(buf,"%s_w%d",output_file.c_str(),i_parallel);
00379         output_file = buf;
00380     }
00381 
00382     //
00383     // *** read the input
00384     //
00385     input = new EGS_Input;
00386     if (ifile.size() > 0) {
00387         if (input->setContentFromFile(ifile.c_str()))
00388             egsFatal("%s\n  error while reading input file %s\n",
00389                      __egs_app_msg1,ifile.c_str());
00390     }
00391 
00392 }
00393 
00394 bool EGS_Application::getArgument(int &argc, char **argv,
00395                                   const char *name1, const char *name2, string &arg) {
00396     string n1(name1), n2(name2);
00397     for (int j=1; j<argc-1; j++) {
00398         if (n1 == argv[j] || n2 == argv[j]) {
00399             arg = argv[j+1];
00400             //for(int i=j; i<argc-2; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+2];
00401             //argc -= 2;
00402             return true;
00403         }
00404     }
00405     return false;
00406 }
00407 
00408 string EGS_Application::constructIOFileName(const char *extension,
00409         bool with_run_dir) const {
00410     string iofile = with_run_dir ? egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir) : app_dir;
00411     iofile = egsJoinPath(iofile,output_file);
00412     if (extension) {
00413         iofile += extension;
00414     }
00415     return iofile;
00416 }
00417 
00418 int EGS_Application::outputData() {
00419 
00420     if (data_out) {
00421         delete data_out;
00422     }
00423     string ofile = constructIOFileName(".egsdat",true);
00424     /*
00425     string ofile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir);
00426     ofile = egsJoinPath(ofile,output_file);
00427     ofile += ".egsdat";
00428     */
00429     data_out = new ofstream(ofile.c_str());
00430     if (!(*data_out)) {
00431         egsWarning("EGS_Application::outputData: failed to open %s "
00432                    "for writing\n",ofile.c_str());
00433         return 1;
00434     }
00435     if (!run->storeState(*data_out)) {
00436         return 2;
00437     }
00438     if (!egsStoreI64(*data_out,current_case)) {
00439         return 3;
00440     }
00441     (*data_out) << endl;
00442     if (!rndm->storeState(*data_out)) {
00443         return 4;
00444     }
00445     if (!source->storeState(*data_out)) {
00446         return 5;
00447     }
00448     for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00449         if (!a_objects_list[j]->storeState(*data_out)) {
00450             return 6;
00451         }
00452     }
00453     return 0;
00454 }
00455 
00456 int EGS_Application::readData() {
00457     if (data_in) {
00458         delete data_in;
00459     }
00460     string ifile = constructIOFileName(".egsdat",false);
00461     /*
00462     string ifile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,output_file);
00463     ifile += ".egsdat";
00464     */
00465     data_in = new ifstream(ifile.c_str());
00466     if (!(*data_in)) {
00467         egsWarning("EGS_Application::readData: failed to open %s "
00468                    "for reading\n",ifile.c_str());
00469         return 1;
00470     }
00471     if (!run->setState(*data_in)) {
00472         return 2;
00473     }
00474     if (!egsGetI64(*data_in,current_case)) {
00475         return 3;
00476     }
00477     last_case = current_case;
00478     if (!rndm->setState(*data_in)) {
00479         return 4;
00480     }
00481     if (!source->setState(*data_in)) {
00482         return 5;
00483     }
00484     for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00485         if (!a_objects_list[j]->setState(*data_in)) {
00486             return 6;
00487         }
00488     }
00489     return 0;
00490 }
00491 
00492 void EGS_Application::resetCounter() {
00493     last_case = 0;
00494     current_case = 0;
00495     run->resetCounter();
00496     rndm->resetCounter();
00497     source->resetCounter();
00498     for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00499         a_objects_list[j]->resetCounter();
00500     }
00501 
00502 }
00503 
00504 int EGS_Application::addState(istream &data) {
00505     if (!run->addState(data)) {
00506         return 1;
00507     }
00508     EGS_I64 tmp_case;
00509     if (!egsGetI64(data,tmp_case)) {
00510         return 2;
00511     }
00512     current_case += tmp_case;
00513     last_case = current_case;
00514     if (!rndm->addState(data)) {
00515         return 3;
00516     }
00517     if (!source->addState(data)) {
00518         return 4;
00519     }
00520     for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00521         if (!a_objects_list[j]->addState(data)) {
00522             return 5;
00523         }
00524     return 0;
00525 }
00526 
00527 int EGS_Application::combineResults() {
00528     egsInformation(
00529         "\n                      Suming the following .egsdat files:\n"
00530         "=======================================================================\n");
00531     char buf[512];
00532     resetCounter();
00533     EGS_Float last_cpu = 0;
00534     EGS_I64 last_ncase = 0;
00535     int ndat = 0;
00536     bool ok = true;
00537     for (int j=1; j<500; j++) {
00538         sprintf(buf,"%s_w%d.egsdat",output_file.c_str(),j);
00539         string dfile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,buf);
00540         ifstream data(dfile.c_str());
00541         if (data) {
00542             int err = addState(data);
00543             ++ndat;
00544             if (!err) {
00545                 EGS_I64 ncase = run->getNdone();
00546                 EGS_Float cpu = run->getCPUTime();
00547                 egsInformation("%2d %-30s ncase=%-14lld cpu=%-11.2f\n",
00548                                ndat,buf,ncase-last_ncase,cpu-last_cpu);
00549                 last_ncase = ncase;
00550                 last_cpu = cpu;
00551             }
00552             else {
00553                 ok = false;
00554                 egsWarning("%2d %-30s error %d\n",ndat,buf,err);
00555             }
00556         }
00557     }
00558     if (ndat > 0) {
00559         egsInformation(
00560             "=======================================================================\n");
00561         egsInformation("%40s%-14lld cpu=%-11.2f\n\n","Total ncase=",last_ncase,
00562                        last_cpu);
00563     }
00564     if (ndat > 0) {
00565         return ok ? 0 : -1;
00566     }
00567     else {
00568         return 1;
00569     }
00570 }

00572 EGS_I64 EGS_Application::randomNumbersUsed() const {

00574         return 0;
00575     }
00576     return rndm->numbersUsed();
00577 }

00579 int EGS_Application::initGeometry() {
00580     if (!input) {
00581         return -1;
00582     }
00583     //if( geometry ) { delete geometry; geometry = 0; }
00584     EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(app_index);
00585     geometry = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(input);
00586     if (!geometry) {
00587         return 1;
00588     }
00589     geometry->ref();
00590     return 0;
00591 }
00592 
00593 int EGS_Application::initSource() {
00594     if (!input) {
00595         return -1;
00596     }
00597     //if( source ) { delete source; source = 0; }
00598     source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(input);
00599     if (!source) {
00600         return 1;
00601     }
00602     source->ref();
00603     return 0;
00604 }
00605 
00606 int EGS_Application::initRunControl() {
00607     if (run) {
00608         delete run;
00609     }
00610     if (simple_run) {
00611         run = new EGS_RunControl(this);
00612     }
00613     else {
00614         run = EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(this);
00615     }
00616     if (!run) {
00617         return 1;
00618     }
00619     return 0;
00620 }
00621 
00622 int EGS_Application::initRNG() {
00623     if (rndm) {
00624         delete rndm;
00625     }
00626     int sequence = 0;
00627     if (n_parallel > 0 && i_parallel > 0) {
00628         sequence = i_parallel - 1;
00629     }
00630     if (input) {
00631         rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input,sequence);
00632     }
00633     if (!rndm) {
00634         egsWarning("EGS_Application::initRNG(): using default RNG\n");
00635         rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(sequence);
00636     }
00637     if (!rndm) {
00638         egsWarning("EGS_Application::initRNG(): got null RNG?\n");
00639         return 1;
00640     }
00641     return 0;
00642 }
00643 
00644 int EGS_Application::initSimulation() {
00645     //if( !input ) { egsWarning("%s no input\n",__egs_app_msg2); return -1; }
00646     egsInformation("In EGS_Application::initSimulation()\n");
00647     int err;
00648     bool ok = true;
00649     err = initGeometry();
00650     if (err) {
00651         egsWarning("\n\n%s geometry initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00652         ok = false;
00653     }
00654     err = initSource();
00655     if (err) {
00656         egsWarning("\n\n%s source initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00657         ok = false;
00658     }
00659     err = initRNG();
00660     if (err) {
00661         egsWarning("\n\n%s RNG initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00662         ok = false;
00663     }
00664     err = initRunControl();
00665     if (err) {
00666         egsWarning("\n\n%s run control initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00667         ok = false;
00668     }
00669     if (!ok) {
00670         return 1;
00671     }
00672     err = initEGSnrcBackEnd();
00673     if (err) {
00674         egsWarning("\n\n%s back-end initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00675         return 2;
00676     }
00677     describeUserCode();
00678     err = initCrossSections();
00679     if (err) {
00680         egsWarning("\n\n%s cross section initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00681         return 3;
00682     }
00683     err = initScoring();
00684     if (err) {
00685         egsWarning("\n\n%s scoring initialization failed with status %d\n",
00686                    __egs_app_msg2,err);
00687         return 4;
00688     }
00689     initAusgabObjects();
00690     //describeSimulation();
00691     return 0;
00692 }
00693 
00694 void EGS_Application::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00695     if (source) {
00696         source->setSimulationChunk(nstart,nrun);
00697     }
00698 }
00699 
00700 void EGS_Application::describeSimulation() {
00701     if (!geometry && !source) {
00702         return;
00703     }
00704     egsInformation("\n\n");
00705     if (geometry) {
00706         geometry->printInfo();
00707     }
00708     if (source) egsInformation("\n\nThe simulation uses the following source:"
00709                                    "\n========================================="
00710                                    "\n %s\n\n\n",source->getSourceDescription());
00711     if (rndm) {
00712         rndm->describeRNG();
00713         egsInformation("\n\n");
00714     }
00715     if (a_objects_list.size() > 0) {
00716         egsInformation("The following ausgab objects are included in the simulation\n");
00717         egsInformation("===========================================================\n\n");
00718         for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00719             egsInformation("%s",a_objects_list[j]->getObjectDescription());
00720         }
00721         egsInformation("\n\n");
00722     }
00723 }
00724 
00725 int EGS_Application::runSimulation() {
00726     bool ok = true;
00727     if (!geometry) {
00728         egsWarning("%s no geometry\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00729         ok = false;
00730     }
00731     if (!source) {
00732         egsWarning("%s no source\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00733         ok = false;
00734     }
00735     if (!rndm) {
00736         egsWarning("%s no RNG\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00737         ok = false;
00738     }
00739     if (!run) {
00740         egsWarning("%s no run control object\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00741         ok = false;
00742     }
00743     if (!ok) {
00744         return 1;
00745     }
00746 
00747     int start_status = run->startSimulation();
00748     if (start_status) {
00749         if (start_status < 0) {
00750             egsWarning("\n%s failed to start the simulation\n\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00751         }
00752         return start_status;
00753     }
00754 
00755     EGS_I64 ncase;
00756     bool next_chunk = true;
00757 
00758     while (next_chunk && (ncase = run->getNextChunk()) > 0) {
00759 
00760         egsInformation("\nRunning %lld histories\n",ncase);
00761         double f,df;
00762         if (run->getCombinedResult(f,df)) {
00763             char c = '%';
00764             egsInformation("    combined result from this and other parallel"
00765                            " runs: %lg +/- %7.3lf%c\n\n",f,df,c);
00766         }
00767         else {
00768             egsInformation("\n");
00769         }
00770         int nbatch = run->getNbatch();
00771         EGS_I64 ncase_per_batch = ncase/nbatch;
00772         if (!ncase_per_batch) {
00773             ncase_per_batch = 1;
00774             nbatch = ncase;
00775         }
00776         for (int ibatch=0; ibatch<nbatch; ibatch++) {
00777             if (!run->startBatch(ibatch,ncase_per_batch)) {
00778                 egsInformation("  startBatch() loop termination\n");
00779                 next_chunk = false;
00780                 break;
00781             }
00782             for (EGS_I64 icase=0; icase<ncase_per_batch; icase++) {
00783                 if (simulateSingleShower()) {
00784                     egsInformation("  simulateSingleShower() "
00785                                    "loop termination\n");
00786                     next_chunk = false;
00787                     break;
00788                 }
00789             }
00790             if (!next_chunk) {
00791                 break;
00792             }
00793             if (!run->finishBatch()) {
00794                 egsInformation("  finishBatch() loop termination\n");
00795                 next_chunk = false;
00796                 break;
00797             }
00798         }
00799     }
00800     // call this from within finishSimulation()
00801     //run->finishSimulation();
00802     return 0;
00803 }
00804 
00805 int EGS_Application::simulateSingleShower() {
00806     int ireg;
00807     int ntry = 0;
00808     last_case = current_case;
00809     do {
00810         ntry++;
00811         if (ntry > 100000) {
00812             egsWarning("EGS_Application::simulateSingleShower(): no particle"
00813                        " from the source has entered the geometry after 100000"
00814                        " attempts\n");
00815             return 1;
00816         }
00817         current_case =
00818             source->getNextParticle(rndm,p.q,p.latch,p.E,p.wt,p.x,p.u);
00819         ireg = geometry->isWhere(p.x);
00820         if (ireg < 0) {
00821             EGS_Float t = 1e30;
00822             ireg = geometry->howfar(ireg,p.x,p.u,t);
00823             if (ireg >= 0) {
00824                 p.x += p.u*t;
00825             }
00826         }
00827     }
00828     while (ireg < 0);
00829     p.ir = ireg;
00830     int err = startNewShower();
00831     if (err) {
00832         return err;
00833     }
00834     err = shower();
00835     if (err) {
00836         return err;
00837     }
00838     return finishShower();
00839 }
00840 
00841 int EGS_Application::startNewShower() {
00842     if (current_case != last_case) {
00843         for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00844             a_objects_list[j]->setCurrentCase(current_case);
00845         }
00846     }
00847     return 0;
00848 }
00849 
00850 EGS_Application::~EGS_Application() {
00851     if (rndm) {
00852         delete rndm;
00853     }
00854     if (run) {
00855         delete run;
00856     }
00857     if (input) {
00858         delete input;
00859     }
00860     EGS_Object::deleteObject(source);
00861     if (geometry) {
00862         if (!geometry->deref()) {
00863             EGS_Application *app = active_egs_application;
00864             active_egs_application = this;
00865             EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(app_index);
00866             delete geometry;
00867             active_egs_application = app;
00868         }
00869     }
00870     /*
00871     if( a_objects ) {
00872         for(int j=(int)BeforeTransport; j<=(int)AugerEvent; ++j) {
00873             while( a_objects[j].size() ) EGS_Object::deleteObject(a_objects[j].pop());
00874         }
00875         delete [] a_objects;
00876     }
00877     */
00878     if (a_objects) {
00879         delete [] a_objects;
00880     }
00881     if (ghistory) {
00882         delete ghistory;
00883     }
00884     if (active_egs_application == this) {
00885         active_egs_application = 0;
00886     }
00887 }
00888 
00889 void EGS_Application::addAusgabObject(EGS_AusgabObject *o) {
00890     if (!o) {
00891         return;
00892     }
00893     o->setApplication(this);
00894     a_objects_list.add(o);
00895     //int ncall = 1 + (int)AugerEvent;
00896     int ncall = (int)UnknownCall;
00897     if (!a_objects) {
00898         a_objects = new EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_AusgabObject *> [ncall];
00899     }
00900     for (int call=(int)BeforeTransport; call<ncall; ++call) {
00901         if (o->needsCall((AusgabCall)call)) {
00902             a_objects[call].add(o);
00903             setAusgabCall((AusgabCall)call,true);
00904         }
00905     }
00906 }
00907 
00908 void EGS_Application::initAusgabObjects() {
00909     if (!input) {
00910         return;
00911     }
00912     EGS_AusgabObject::createAusgabObjects(input);
00913     for (int i=0; i<EGS_AusgabObject::nObjects(); ++i) {
00914         addAusgabObject(EGS_AusgabObject::getObject(i));
00915     }
00916 }
00917 
00918 int EGS_Application::finishSimulation() {
00919     //I don't think we need a separate analyzeResults function.
00920     //analyzeResults();
00921     int err = 0;
00922     if (run) {
00923         err = run->finishSimulation();
00924         if (err < 0) {
00925             return err;
00926         }
00927     }
00928 
00929     outputResults();
00930     for (int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00931         a_objects_list[j]->reportResults();
00932     }
00933 
00934     if (data_out) {
00935         delete data_out;
00936         data_out = 0;
00937         /*
00938         #ifdef WIN32
00939         string dfile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir);
00940         dfile = egsJoinPath(dfile,output_file);
00941         dfile += ".egsdat";
00942         string command = "move /Y ";
00943         command += dfile; command += "  "; command += app_dir;
00944         egsInformation("About to execute <%s>\n",command.c_str());
00945         int istat = system(command.c_str());
00946         if( istat ) egsWarning("Failed to move the .egsdat file from the"
00947                " working directory\n");
00948         #endif
00949         */
00950     }
00951     finishRun();
00952     run_dir = "";  // i.e. from now on all output will go to the user code
00953     // directory.
00954     return err;
00955 }

00957 void EGS_Application::fillRandomArray(int n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00958     rndm->fillArray(n,rarray);
00959 }
00960 
00961 void EGS_Application::checkDeviceFull(FILE *stream) {
00962 #ifndef WIN32
00963     // quit if space left on disk is less than 1 MB to mitigate disk full problems
00964 
00965     // stat the stream
00966     struct stat tmp;
00967     fstat(fileno(stream), &tmp);
00968 
00969     // check only if the stream is a regular file
00970     if (S_ISREG(tmp.st_mode)) {
00971         struct statvfs fstats;
00972         fstatvfs(fileno(stdout), &fstats);
00973         if (fstats.f_bavail*fstats.f_bsize < 1048576) {
00974             egsFatal("\n\n******** Space left on file system is below 1 MB. Quitting now.\n");
00975             exit(1);
00976         }
00977     }
00978 #endif
00979 }
00980 
00981 void EGS_Application::appInformation(const char *msg) {
00982     if (msg) {
00983         fprintf(stdout,"%s",msg);
00984         fflush(stdout);
00985         checkDeviceFull(stdout);
00986     }
00987 }
00988 
00989 void EGS_Application::appWarning(const char *msg) {
00990     if (msg) {
00991         fprintf(stderr,"%s",msg);
00992         fflush(stderr);
00993         checkDeviceFull(stderr);
00994     }
00995 }
00996 
00997 void EGS_Application::appFatal(const char *msg) {
00998     if (msg) {
00999         fprintf(stderr,"%s",msg);
01000         fflush(stderr);
01001     }
01002     exit(1);
01003 }
